title: Provisions) Act 2020 (No. 13 of 2020), and being of the opinion that it is
heading: 1. (1) This Order may be cited as the Civil Law and Criminal Law
text_raw:
1. (1) This Order may be cited as the Civil Law and Criminal Law 
(Miscellaneous Provisions) Act 2020 (Section 29) (Meetings of the Oberstown 
Children Detention Campus Board of Management) (Designation) Order 2020. 

(2) This Order comes into operation on 26 November 2020.
text_norm: 1 (1) order may cited civil law criminal law (miscellaneous provisions) act 2020 (section 29) (meetings oberstown child detention campus board management) (designation) order 2020 (2) order come operation 26 november 2020

title: Provisions) Act 2020 (No. 13 of 2020), and being of the opinion that it is
heading: 2. A meeting of the Oberstown Children Detention Campus Board of
text_raw:
2. A meeting of the Oberstown Children Detention Campus Board of 
Management is designated for the purposes of section 29 of the Civil Law and 
Criminal Law (Miscellaneous Provisions) Act 2020 (No. 13 of 2020). 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

26 November, 2020. 

RODERIC O'GORMAN, 

 Minister for Children, Equality,Disability, Integration and 
Youth. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 1st December, 2020. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [553] 3

title: Provisions) Act 2020 (No. 13 of 2020), and being of the opinion that it is
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

This instrument provides that meetings of Oberstown Children Detention 
Campus Board of Management may be conducted by remote means. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [553]
